mapper.select: select count(*) from notice n join n_category nc on n.n_categoryNum = nc.n_categoryNum

select noticeNum, n.adminId, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticeFile, noticeDate, nc.n_categoryName from notice n join admin a on n.adminId = a.adminId join n_category nc on n.n_categoryNum = nc.n_categoryNum where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
select noticeFile from notice where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}

select count(*) from notice n join n_category nc on n.n_categoryNum = nc.n_categoryNum
${search_option} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
(n.adminId like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or noticeTitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or nc.n_categoryName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
mapper.insert: insert into notice(noticeNum, adminId, noticeTitle, noticeContent, n_categoryNum, noticeFile) values (seq_notice.nextval, #{adminId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{n_categoryNum}, #{noticeFile})
mapper.update: update notice set noticeTitle=#{noticeTitle}, noticeContent=#{noticeContent}, noticeFile=#{noticeFile} where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
